glass.description: He likes drinking from a glass, but it requires close supervision.  Even so, we've had to get out the mop a few times.  And he figured out straws.
glass.title: Glass

moscone.description: There's playground downtown, at Yerba Buena, with this very baby-friendly fountain.  Both Lucie and Sylvie often take him here on hot days.  His toys make him plenty of friends.
moscone.title: Moscone

park2.description: Is Lucie practicing a martial art?  No, we're playing bocce ball (petanque).  She just threw her ball.
park2.title: Park 2

sick.description: Felix spent the weekend sick.  He was an especially sad looking baby Saturday morning.
sick.title: Sick

table.description: New furniture!  Felix table by day, coffee table by night.
table.title: Table

tongue.description: Most babies discover their tongues at a very early age.  Felix just found out about his, and is quite proud of it.
tongue.title: Tongue

description:
The weather has been deliciously warm, and we've been touring the parks of the Bay Area. Felix with his rumpled hair and shorts and sandals is looking a lot like Dean, which we find extremely cute.

The top left canine has come in; the other three canines are sure to come barking along soon. That leaves the last 4 molars to complete his baby teeth.

It seems like he says something new every few hours, but only a few things have become repeated and predictable:

  • da: dog. The actual word for dog is slowly replacing the baby sign for dog (panting).
  • beep beep: car horn. He uses this when playing with toy cars. "Beep beep!"

See this week's videos.
title: May 25
